baseQuery: ("chronobiology" OR circadian OR "time of day") AND (treatment OR anesthesia OR vaccination)
query: (("chronobiology" OR circadian OR "time of day") AND (treatment OR anesthesia OR vaccination)) AND (Animals[MeSH Terms] OR "Veterinary Medicine"[MeSH Terms] OR "Animal Diseases"[MeSH Terms] OR animal[Title/Abstract] OR veterinary[Title/Abstract] OR "animal health"[Title/Abstract] OR "one health"[Title/Abstract])
